Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Conmoss
Reviews.Content: This Phone is Good enough But I had several problems with it:1. the first problem is that this phone does not have Russian Language in it2. The phone is not totally covered with titanium. The part of it is plastic (black plastic) and I didn't like it. It is described that it should be whole titanium and this little piece of plastic seems not beautiful. Better sell what you describe by the images.

Reviews.Title: Fake product
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: Dear amaozn please note that the item is replica fake item from china with a nokia made in germany logo , its a cheating . Pleaese find me a way to deal with this cheater

Reviews.Title: Hallo
Reviews.Author: Armen
Reviews.Content: I am interested in your item, nokia 8800 sirocco gold. I wonder if it is a Chinese product, where is this item located? I will only buy an original nokia 8800 sirocco, that has been produced in the Nokia factory. Is it undamaged and unused item? Is it the item, I want?Thanks
